ygData.subject: Re: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: I can only chat up the barkeeps and Innkeepers.  Because they re the only real women in Norrath :P Um, except my wife...who I hope doesn t see this... Golias,
ygData.messageBody:
I can only chat up the barkeeps and Innkeepers. Because they're the only real
women in Norrath :P

Um, except my wife...who I hope doesn't see this...

Golias, Sol Ro

==========
You forgot my favorite time slice, and that's chatting up the women.
I put aside an hour or two each day to sing to all the girls, and
tell the tales of Harmonic who single handedly defeated Cazic Thule,
how he slashed Maestro with his 6-note blade, how he can solo the Lord
Room with his helmet visor down.

Now that's quality time.

Harmonic.
